strings.Value: {g|Relations2_1}[Choice effects]{/g} "Let's just look the other way. They're only hunters."
{g|Relations2_2}[Choice effects]{/g} "We will immediately increase border control. We must put an end to such incursions immediately!"
{g|Relations2_3}[Choice effects]{/g} "I agree with your proposal. Set the fines as you see fit."
"You can deal with this without me."
"This will only take a moment! Really, it's nothing. But I do need your advice!"

"Some hunters from {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g} are wandering the outskirts of your {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}. If you ask me – I don't care. There's enough game for everyone. But the locals are outraged: what kind of {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom} is it, if just anyone can cross our borders!"
{n}Linzi shrugs.{/n} "We are not going to introduce border patrols because a couple of does got shot! Right? Right?"

"It appears that not all of your neighbors know that lawful order has come to the {g|Stolen Lands}Stolen Lands{/g}!" {n}Valerie frowns severely.{/n} "Over many years, they have grown accustomed to these territories belonging to monsters and bandits – and have learned to behave accordingly."

"I've heard rumor that hunters from {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g} cross the borders into the {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}, searching for game. They cross state borders as easily as wading across a stream!"

"I don't want to sit idly and watch, as the peasantry of a foreign kingdom mocks our laws! Please, enforce control over the {mf|barony|barony|kingdom|kingdom}'s borders – it will be an important move, for anyone who doesn't yet take your rule seriously!"
{n}Bartholomew bows to you.{/n} "You won't believe this, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}. There are border crossers in your lands!"
"In fact they're just some deer hunters from {g|Pitax}Pitax{/g}, roaming the swamps looking for game. But they gave me a wonderful idea – which I hasten to share with you!"

"Of course, we could look the other way in this situation... Or enforce border control... but I propose something else: let's set large fines for crossing our borders! Believe me, these adventurers will have an easy choice between money and prison!"
"That's what I thought too! So let's discuss something more important..."
{n}Valerie squints.{/n} "I am concerned by your casual attitude towards such a serious issue. But so be it."
{n}Bartholomew waves his hands.{/n} "Why pass up such an opportunity?" {n}He quickly straightens himself.{/n} "Well, if this is your wish, I dare not argue."
{n}Linzi lets out a disappointed moan.{/n} "Seriously? Just because someone got lost while they were hunting? We could just pretend we didn't notice!"
{n}Valerie nods.{/n} "I will see to it that our soldiers take up this duty as soon as possible."
"As you wish, as you wish..."
{n}Bartholomew breaks into a sugary smile.{/n} "Thank you, {mf|Your Grace|Your Grace|Your Highness|Your Highness}!"
"Then I will try to calm our over-vigilant subjects!"
"Agreed. I will set up border outposts at the first opportunity."
"Then your treasury will soon be filled at the expense of our neighbors!"
